name: VR SAMURAI
description:
Mode: Tilt
Hero is moved to the left and right by tilting the smartphone.
While fending off the attack of enemy small fry well, please forward.
When you tap the smartphone screen, make the attack.

Mode: VR
Set the smartphone to VR corresponding HMD.
Follow the on-screen message, please secure the point of view.
Countdown begins, the game will start.
In VR mode, by tilting the head (Smartphone), the hero is moved to the left and right.
While fending off the attack of enemy small fry well, please forward.
Attack is automatic. It feeds automatically attack at a constant rhythm.
※ It does not correspond to the iPad.

Special attack
To jump higher and move forward turret of (burning including tower), and landing at the same time special attack will trigger.
Proceeding in front of the rock, jump, landing at the same time as the special attack will trigger.
When the coin on the field collect six, it will be a certain period of time invincible along with the character of "Muso Roku Monsen".

Enemy main warlords
If advance a certain distance, it will be the battle mode of the Tokugawa how main warlords.
Follow the instructions on the screen, please Tilt the head (Smartphone) to the left and right timing well.
Repeat the attack hand-protect hand, we fight a duel with the enemy general.

Weapon
As the game progresses, the weapon will increase.

title
As the game progresses, the title will change.
